docTitle.titlePart:
Al 2 O 3 -SiO 2 Core Highly Nonlinear Dispersion-shifted Fiber
with Brillouin Gain Suppression Improved by 6.1dB

byline.docAuthor: Tetsuya Nakanishi, Masato Tanaka, Takemi Hasegawa, Masaaki Hirano, Toshiaki Okuno, and Masashi Onishi

front.div:
Abstract Al2O3-SiO2 core Highly Nonlinear Dispersion-shifted Fiber with high nonlinear coefficient of 19W
-1 km
-1 is
successfully fabricated for the first time. The suppression of Brillouin gain by 6.1dB as compared with
conventional HNL-DSF is demonstrated.
